scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n client,server -c green,red "npm run dev --prefix ./client" "npm run dev --prefix ./server"
scripts.start: concurrently -k -n client,server -c green,red "npm run start --prefix ./client" "npm run start --prefix ./server"
scripts.i: npm install && npm install --prefix ./client && npm install --prefix ./server
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix ./client && npm run build --prefix ./server
scripts.db: npm prisma generate --prefix ./server && npm prisma migrate dev --prefix ./server
